name: Mountain Cat
description:
Mountain Cat is a curious little kitty who enjoys living life on the edge to eat fish. 

*IMPORTANT*
This is the first game I developed and I decided to share it with my friends for fun. Later on, I decided to  open it up for the public to play; however, it is extremely unpolished. Just have fun and please be nice! :-)

Bugs:
- You can still die after eating all 5 fish, so I recommend winning away from the boulders.
- I did not implement a "Quit" function, so you will need to manually exit out of the game.
